mapper.insert: insert into t_sub_define (id, sub_define_name, year, create_by, create_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subDefineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_sub_define
id,
sub_define_name,
year,
create_by,
create_date,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{subDefineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update t_sub_define
sub_define_name = #{subDefineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select t.id,t.sub_define_name,t.year,t.create_by,t.create_date from t_sub_define t left join t_org_ref_subdefine os on t.id = os.sub_define_id
os.org_id = #{orgId}
